answers: Sound is a type of energy that makes us hear.

questions: What is the other name of voice box ?
Which two properties of sound help us to recognize it ?
Which animal can hear sounds of frequencies higher than 20,000 Hz ?

Does sound travel through all mediums?
answers: Yes, it travels through all mediums such as solid, liquid and gases.

questions: Write a precaution to prevent eardrum damage.
answers: Never put a sharp, pointed or hard thing into your ear.
1 Hz is one oscillation per second.

questions: What is the unit of loudness. At and after which range noise becomes painful ?
answers: Decibel, at about 80 dB and afterwards the noise becomes audibly painful.
